name: Glider (itch) (MichaelMXY)
description:
___What are the controls to your game? How do we play?___

Keyboard "WASD" and mouse to control the plane. Left click your mouse to shoot the projectile.

  ___What creative additions did you make? How can we find them?___

1. click W and S to move the plane up and down.

2. use your mouse to roll over the plane.

3. click left mouse button to fire the projectile.

4. the projectile will be destroyed since 5 seconds.

5. original fantastic background music

Other things (Including art) followed the tutorial on "Game Design, Prototyping, and Development 3rd Edition.
